sentences.en: a car with an excellent suspension system
sentences.cn: 一辆拥有出色减震装置的汽车

sentences.en: A four - day suspension was imposed on her.
Despite the risk of suspension, he remained defiant.
sentences.cn: 尽管可能会被停职，他仍然桀骜不驯。

sentences.en: Grima has started to work off his eight - match suspension.
sentences.cn: 格里马开始经受被停赛八场的处罚.

sentences.en: He appealed against his suspension, but the committee stood by their decision.
sentences.cn: 他对被停职一事提出上诉, 可委员会维持他们的决定.

sentences.en: He incurred a suspension on reduced pay.
sentences.cn: 他受到了降薪停职处分.

sentences.en: He received a six-month suspension for unprofessional behaviour.
sentences.cn: 他因有违职业道德的行为被停职六个月。

sentences.en: He's now facing suspension after a dust-up with the referee.
sentences.cn: 在与裁判发生争执后他现在面临着停赛。

sentences.en: Some trains were so overloaded that their suspension collapsed.
sentences.cn: 一些列车严重超载，结果悬架都断裂了。

sentences.en: State - of - the - art suspension guarantees a smooth passage over the bumpiest road.
sentences.cn: 最先进的减震悬架保证汽车在最崎岖不平的道路上也可以平稳通行.

sentences.en: The active suspension system gives the car a very smooth ride.
sentences.cn: 这个主动悬架系统使汽车行驶起来非常平稳。

sentences.en: The athlete could face a lengthy period of suspension if found guilty.
sentences.cn: 如果被判有罪,这名运动员可能面临长期停赛.

sentences.en: The athlete received a two-year suspension following a positive drug test.
sentences.cn: 该运动员因尿检结果呈阳性而被停赛两年。

sentences.en: The film version requires greater suspension of disbelief than the book.
sentences.cn: 与原书比起来,电影版需要带给观众更多的悬念.

sentences.en: The local authorities decided to build a suspension bridge over the river.
sentences.cn: 地方当局决定在这条河上建一座吊桥.

sentences.en: The minister warned that any civil servant not at his desk faced immediate suspension.
sentences.cn: 部长警告说，任何擅离职守的公务员都会被立即停职。

sentences.en: The new model is fitted with computercontrolled suspension.
sentences.cn: 新型号安装了数控悬架.
